casebody.data:
VOGLER
v.
BRANCH ERECTIONS CO. No. 128A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 23, 2007. Christopher J. Blake, Leslie Lane Mize, Raleigh, for NC Ins. Guaranty Asso. J. Randolph Ward, Cary, for Branch Erections Co.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of April 2007 by Defendant (NCIGA) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (NCIGA) shall have up to and including 30 days after the Court's decision as to Branch Erection's Petition for Discretionary Review to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of April 2007."
